problem.markdown:
1. Steatite is produced by mixing ___________ with small proton of ________ and ___________.
() Hydrated magnesium silicate,carbon,clay () Hydrated magnesium silicate,carbon,nitrogen () Hydrated magnesium silicate,nitrogen,clay (x) Hydrated magnesium silicate, clay, feldspar
2. The transmission lines and feeders are _____________
() 3-phase 3-wire circuits (x) 3-phase 3-wire circuit () 2-phase 2-wire circuits () None of them
3. The transmission lines are _____________
() 3-phase 3-wire circuits () None of them (x) 3-phase 4-wire circuits () 2-phase 2-wire circuits
4. The maximum generated voltage in power generating stations in advanced countries is 33kV while that in India is _________
() 6kV () 44kV () 9kV (x) 11kV
5. The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.
() 2 times lesser than () Equal to (x) Greater than () Lesser than
problem.p: 1. Steatite is produced by mixing ___________ with small proton of ________ and ___________.
2. The transmission lines and feeders are _____________
4. The maximum generated voltage in power generating stations in advanced countries is 33kV while that in India is _________
5. The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.
